00044         void enableAsciiTraceDownlink(const int i_downlink_port) {
00045                 ns3::CsmaHelper csma_helper;
00046                 csma_helper.EnableAscii(asciiTracePrefix, this->getDownlinkPort(
00047                                 i_downlink_port));
00048         }

00057                         false) {

00060                                 i_downlink_port), promiscuous);

00070         EunetTerminals& getTerminals() {

00072                 //return this->ncTerminals;
00073         }//getTerminals

00075         ns3::NetDeviceContainer getTerminalDevices() {
00076                 ns3::NetDeviceContainer ndc;
00077                 for (unsigned i = 0; i < this->eunetTerminals.GetN(); ++i) {
00078                         ndc.Add(this->eunetTerminals.Get(i)->getCsmaNetDevice(0));
00079                 }//for
00080                 return ndc;
00081         }//getTerminalDevices
00082 
00083         ns3::Ptr<EunetTerminal> getTerminal(const int i_downlink_port) {

00085         }//getTerminal
